name: Super Rabbit Pixelmania
description:
Classical match-3 game with everybody's favourite rabbits! Create combos, gain bombs and blow away rabbits that just don't want to create a line!

Absolute freedom with creating level, define how much rows, columns and colors are present! You can even play on 3x3 sized level, or maybe select just two colors for massive autobattle, points and combos!

Resize your game window to favourite resolution! Customize buttons to your heart's content! Default arrow keys to move cursor, Z to select field, X to cancel selection, SPACE to detonate surrounding area.

Game is too slow? Or maybe you want to see falling chunks of rabbits in slow motion? Use buttons '=' and '-' to adjust speed of the game! You can even make rabbits stop from falling or raise them up!

Increase your immersion with screen shake! But beware, crossing shaking factor 5 will include additional flashing lights! Simulate earthquake and lightning storm at once!

Featuring incredible electrical music from Hinkik!
